title: solarEclipses
text: solarEclipses::launch_app() function starts interactive Shiny application allows users explore data related solar eclipses visually. dynamic plots user-friendly controls, app provides insights eclipse paths, timings, relevant details. Conclusion many ways explore eclipse data. can experiment plots, filter data eclipse type location, gain insights.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zhu F (2024). solarEclipses: Timing Duration Analysis Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States 2024. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://etc5523-2024.github.io/assignment-4-packages--shiny-apps-Fengz924/.

what: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
title: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
text: goal solarEclipses provide easy access clean structured data solar eclipses analysis visualization. R package includes detailed information various types solar eclipses, total annular eclipses, along key attributes, including date, location, duration, name.

title: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
text: can install development version solarEclipses GitHub using remotes package :

title: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
text: basic example shows load dataset. following code allow see summary dataset: can also embed plots, example: Plot showing eclipse durations geographic locations.
code: library(solarEclipses) data("clean_eclipse_data") summary(clean_eclipse_data) #>     state               name                lat             lon          #>  Length:4141        Length:4141        Min.   :27.22   Min.   :-124.45   #>  Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:34.79   1st Qu.: -97.30   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :38.54   Median : -89.08   #>                                        Mean   :37.76   Mean   : -91.06   #>                                        3rd Qu.:41.09   3rd Qu.: -83.68   #>                                        Max.   :46.91   Max.   : -67.43   #>   eclipse_1          eclipse_2          eclipse_3          eclipse_4         #>  Length:4141        Length:4141        Length:4141        Length:4141        #>  Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   #>                                                                              #>                                                                              #>                                                                              #>   eclipse_5          eclipse_6            duration         Type           #>  Length:4141        Length:4141        Min.   :137.8   Length:4141        #>  Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:150.7   Class :character   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :154.3   Mode  :character   #>                                        Mean   :157.2                      #>                                        3rd Qu.:159.2                      #>                                        Max.   :191.7 plot(clean_eclipse_data$duration)

title: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
text: solarEclipses::launch_app() function starts interactive Shiny application allows users explore data related solar eclipses visually.

title: Eclipse Data — clean_eclipse_data
text: dataset contains solar eclipses, including type, date, duration, location.

title: Eclipse Data — clean_eclipse_data
text: data frame 4,141 rows 12 variables: Date date eclipse (YYYY-MM-DD). Type type eclipse: Total, Annular, Partial, Hybrid. Duration duration eclipse minutes. Lat latitude eclipse event. Lon longitude eclipse event.

title: Filter Eclipses by Type — filter_eclipses_by_type
text: Filters solar eclipses based specified type: "Annular 2024" "Total 2024".

title: Filter Eclipses by Type — filter_eclipses_by_type
text: data data frame containing solar eclipse information. eclipse_type string specifying type eclipse ("Annular 2024" "Total 2024").

title: Filter Eclipses by Type — filter_eclipses_by_type
text: data frame filtered specified eclipse type.

title: Launch the Shiny app — launch_app
text: Shiny app allows users explore solar eclipse data interactively. Users can filter eclipse type minimum duration, visualize locations map, view filtered data table. function launches Shiny app included package.

title: Launch the Shiny app — launch_app
text: Opens new web window displaying interactive Shiny app.
